reviewComments: Just a few miles outside of Ukiah. They have a huge tasting room and gift shop, very tasteful and comfortable. Chardonays were good. Pinot Noir - maybe skip. A fun and lovely... read more
Barra of Mendocino Winery.knownFor: “ Family-owned winery in Mendocino! ” Reviewed June 9, 2012 We loved the Barra family hospitality: Martha and Charlie Barra provided a wonderful wine tasting experience and conversation. We also met there a group of wonderful people from Paradise, California. The wines at Barra are organic, which is a plus! Helpful? Thank Elena152024 Report BARRAwinegirl, Manager at Barra of Mendocino Winery, responded to this review Thank you so much! We had a fun day in the tasting room. It was a pleasure to meet both you and your husband! Please come visit again soon! More Previous Next 1 2 Updating list... Vic's Place.knownFor: “ excellent traditional bar ” Reviewed January 21, 2015 very friendly, one of the best small town bars i have visited, friendly people, no WiFi, lots of taxidermy on walls, no food but Mexican restaurant next door delivers to bar, one of the only beer & licour off licences in mendocino, open late till 2 am Helpful?
